title: Jump to navigation header on Games page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the bottom of the Games page
AND the user presses the [triangle] button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the [Games] button in the navigation header at the top of the screen gains focus
AND the page scrolls to the top
AND the user stays on the Games page

title: Game Tile Order
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN a user selects the [calendar] button
AND selects a day with games
custom_expected:
THEN the number of game tiles is the same as was selected on the calendar
AND there are 4 tiles per row
AND games should be ordered by favorite team, following teams, live games with more progress to live games with less progress, games that have not started by nearest start time to latest start time, completed games, cancelled/postponed

title: Games page UI - Date is not today
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is is on the Games page
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a day with games other than today
custom_expected:
THEN the days games are displayed
AND the selected date is appearing on the left side of the screen above the grid of game tiles in <DayOfWeek>, <Month> <Day> format
AND the [Today] button displays directly to the left of the [<] button on the right side of the screen above the grid of game tiles 
AND arrow buttons [<][>] display directly to the right of the [Today] button
AND a calendar button/icon displays directly to the right of the [>] button

title: Games page UI - Date is today
custom_preconds: GIVEN the MLB app is launched
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to the Games page
custom_expected:
THEN "Today's Games" is displayed above and to the left of the game tiles
AND a calendar button/icon is displayed in the upper right corner of the page
AND arrow buttons [<][>] display directly to the left of the calendar button/icon
AND the number of game tiles that are displaying is the same as total number of games for the day

Update the startDate and endDate in below url to get total number of games for the date range
https://qa-statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?startDate=08/19/2022&endDate=08/19/2022&fields=dates,date,totalGames&sportId=1

title: Navigate through future days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has launched the app
AND the user is on the Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select the next day [>] button
AND the user navigates 8 days into the future
custom_expected:
THEN a loading screen with a spinning baseball image displays for every date navigated to
AND the Games page updates to display the games for each day that is navigated to
AND a [Today] button appears to the left of the [<] button

title: Navigate through past days
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has launched the app
AND the user is on the Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select the next day [<] button
AND the user navigates 8 days into the past
custom_expected:
THEN a loading screen with a spinning baseball image displays for every date navigated to
AND the Games page updates to display the games for each day that is navigated to
AND a [Today] button appears to the left of the [<] button

title: Header Navigation - Games page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has launched the app
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the the [Games] button in the navigation header
custom_expected:
THEN the Games page loads
AND focus leaves the 'Games' button in the header
AND the 'Games' text color changes from black to white
AND the 'Games' text becomes bold
AND all other button text in the header is not bold
AND focus is assigned to the top row furthest left game tile

title: Header Navigation - Games tab focus
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Games page
AND focus is not in the header
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to the header using the UP button
custom_expected:
THEN focus returns to the Games tab in the header
AND the 'Games' text color changes from white to black

title: Today button navigates to today's date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Games page
AND the displayed date/day of games is not today
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the [Today] button
custom_expected:
THEN the [Today] button is dismissed
AND the date in the upper left of the screen updates to "Today's Games"
AND the games for today's date are displayed

title: Unable to load Schedule data
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the mastAPI or statsAPI request is blocked
AND the MLB app is open

**NOTE:** network requests URLs to block
statsAPI - *statsapi.mlb.com
mastAPI - *mlbinfra.com
custom_steps: WHEN a user tries to load the Games page
custom_expected:
THEN an error screen displays
AND the MLB logo and MLB text are displayed top center of the screen
AND a message stating game data could not be loaded
AND an [Okay] button is displayed with focus below the message

title: Unable to load Schedule data - Retry Failure
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the mastapi request is blocked
AND the MLB app is open
AND the 'unable to load games' error screen is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the [Okay] button 3x
custom_expected:
THEN an error screen displays
AND the MLB logo and MLB text are displayed top center of the screen
AND a message stating a critical error has occurred 
AND a [Reset] button is displayed with focus below the message

title: Unable to load Schedule data - Retry Success
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB app is open
AND the 'unable to load games' error screen is displayed
AND the mastapi request is not blocked
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the [Okay] button
custom_expected:
THEN the error screen is dismissed
AND a black screen with a spinning baseball is displayed
AND the user is navigated to the previous page
AND the games scheduled for today are displayed
AND if navigated to the Home page, focus is assigned to the Watch button in the Hero
OR focus is assigned to the Home tab if the Watch button is not in the Hero
AND if navigated to the Games page, focus is assigned to the left most game tile in the top row

title: Unable to load Schedule data - Reset Success
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB app is open
AND the 'No Games' error screen is displayed
AND the user has selected the [Okay] button 3x
AND the mastapi request is not blocked
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the [Reset] button
custom_expected:
THEN the error screen is dismissed
AND a black screen with a spinning baseball is displayed
AND the user is navigated to the Home page
AND the games scheduled for today are displayed
AND focus is assigned to the Watch button in the Hero
OR focus is assigned to the Home tab if the Watch button is not in the Hero

title: Unable to load Schedule data - Reset Failure
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB app is open
AND the 'No Games' error screen is displayed
AND the user has already selected the [Okay] button 3x
AND the mastapi request is blocked
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the [Reset] button
custom_expected:
THEN the error screen is dismissed
AND a black screen with a spinning baseball is displayed to indicate loading
AND the 'No Games' error screen is displayed again

title: Smooth scroll durning navigation
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the Games page
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the [UP] or [DOWN] buttons on the controller
custom_expected: THEN the screen smoothly scrolls vertical as the user navigates up and down the page

title: Settings to Games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Games page
AND navigates to a date that is not today
AND navigates to the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates back to the Games page
custom_expected: THEN the Games page loads with the most up to date information

title: Games Page updates after games player is dismissed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for game playback
AND a user is on the Games page
AND a user has initiated playback of an in progress game
AND the continues playback for a few innings
custom_steps: WHEN the user dismisses playback
custom_expected:
THEN the video player is dismissed
AND the user is brought back to the Games page
AND the Games page updates to display the most up to date game info

title: Today's Games Scheduled Start Times - User's Time Zone
custom_preconds:
GIVEN games are scheduled for today
AND the PlayStation time zone is set to the users current location
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Games page for today
custom_expected: THEN the game tiles show the scheduled start times in the device time zone (format: hh:mm [AM|PM])

title: Today's Games Scheduled Start Times - UTC -11:00 American Samoa
custom_preconds:
GIVEN games are scheduled for today
AND the PlayStation time zone is set to UTC -11:00 American Samoa
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Games page for today
custom_expected: THEN the game tiles show the scheduled start times in the UTC -11:00 American Samoa time zone (format: hh:mm [AM|PM])

title: Today's Games Scheduled Start Times - UTC +00:00 London
custom_preconds:
GIVEN games are scheduled for today
AND the PlayStation time zone is set to UTC +00:00 London
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Games page for today
custom_expected: THEN the game tiles show the scheduled start times in the UTC +00:00 London time zone (format: hh:mm [AM|PM])

title: Today's Games Scheduled Start Times - UTC +11:00 Noumea
custom_preconds:
GIVEN games are scheduled for today
AND the PlayStation time zone is set to UTC +11:00 Noumea
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Games page for today
custom_expected: THEN the game tiles show the scheduled start times in the UTC +13:00 Independent State of Samoa time zone (format: hh:mm [AM|PM])

title: Today's Games Scheduled Start Times - UTC +13:00 Independent State of Samoa
custom_preconds:
GIVEN games are scheduled for today
AND the PlayStation time zone is set to UTC +13:00 Independent State of Samoa
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Games page for today
custom_expected: THEN the game tiles show the scheduled start times in the UTC +13:00 Independent State of Samoa time zone (format: hh:mm [AM|PM])

title: Game Tile Focus State
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Games page
AND the selected date has scheduled games
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to any game tile
custom_expected:
THEN the focused game tile has a white border surrounding the tile
AND the focused game tile is larger than non-focused game tiles
AND there is a drop shadow behind the focused game tile

title: Game tiles display on days with scheduled games
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Games page
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to a date that has scheduled games
custom_expected:
THEN the total number of game tiles equals the number of games on the selected date from the calendar
AND the total number of game tiles equals the total number of game from StatsAPI for the selected date

https://qa-statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/schedule?startDate=06/16/2022&endDate=06/16/2022&fields=dates,date,totalGames&sportId=1
(update startDate and endDate)

title: Game tiles do not display on days with no scheduled games
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Games page
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects a date that does not have scheduled games
custom_expected: THEN there are no game tiles displaying

title: Game Data Updating
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN a live game is in-progress
AND the user stays on the Games page
custom_expected: THEN the game data in the game tile updates as the game progresses

title: Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND Hide Spoilers is set to ON
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the games page
AND navigates to yesterday
AND navigates to tomorrow
AND navigates to today
custom_expected:
THEN the score for yesterdays games are not displayed
AND the Win, Loss, Save pitchers are hidden
AND "FINAL" is displayed below the away team
AND the team win-loss records are not displayed when a game tile gains focus
AND pitching match-ups for tomorrows games are hidden
AND the team win-loss records are not displayed when a game tile gains focus
AND pitching match-ups for todays games that are not in-progress are hidden
AND pitcher batter match-ups for in-progress games are hidden
AND bases info for in-progress games are hidden
AND outs info for in-progress games are hidden
AND the team win-loss records are not displayed when a game tile gains focus

title: Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND Hide Spoilers is set to OFF
custom_steps:
WHEN a user is on the games page
AND navigates to yesterday
AND navigates to tomorrow
AND navigates to today
custom_expected:
THEN the score for yesterdays games are displayed
AND the Win, Loss, Save pitchers are displayed
AND "FINAL" or "FINAL/#" is displayed below the away team
AND the team win-loss records are displayed when a game tile gains focus
AND pitcher headshots, win-loss record, and ERA are displayed when a game tile gains focus
AND pitching match-ups for tomorrows games are displayed
AND the team win-loss records are displayed when a game tile gains focus
AND pitcher headshots, win-loss record, and ERA are displayed when a game tile gains focus
AND pitching match-ups for todays games that are not in-progress are displayed
AND pitcher batter match-ups for in-progress games are displayed
AND bases info for in-progress games are displayed
AND outs info for in-progress games are displayed
AND the team win-loss records are displayed when a game tile gains focus

title: Calendar UI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has launched the app
AND the user is on the Games page
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the [calendar] button
custom_expected:
THEN the calendar for the current month is displayed
AND today's date has a white border
AND each date displays its total number of games for that date in white text
AND the days of the week are 2-letter abbreviations
AND the current month with current year is centered at the top of the page
AND the correct number of days is displayed for the given month
AND the previous month [<] button displays to the left of the month
AND the next month [>] button displays to the right of the year
AND the [Today] button displays in the top right corner
AND the background is black
AND the week starts with Sunday
AND the day numbers are in the upper left corner of the day tiles

title: Select date in the past
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has launched the app
AND the user is on the Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select the [calendar] button
AND the user navigates to the previous month with games
AND the user selects a date with games
custom_expected:
THEN the calendar is dismissed
AND the user is navigated back to the Games page
AND a spinning baseball displays while the page loads
AND games for the selected date are displayed
AND the selected date is displayed in the upper left corner of the screen below the navigation header

title: Select date in the future
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has launched the app
AND the user is on the Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select the [calendar] button
AND the user navigates to the next month, after the current month, with games
AND the user selects a date with games
custom_expected:
THEN a loading screen with a spinning baseball image displays
AND the user is navigated back to the Games page
AND games for the selected date are displayed
AND the selected date is displayed in the upper left corner of the screen below the navigation header

title: Cancel date change from calendar view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has launched the app
AND the user is on the Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select the [calendar] button
AND the user navigates to a date in a different month
AND the user presses the BACK button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the user is navigated back to the Games page
AND games for the previously selected date are displayed
AND the previously selected date is displayed in the upper left corner of the screen below the navigation header

title: Select day with games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has launched the app
AND the user is on the Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select the [calendar] button
AND the user selects a date that has games
custom_expected:
THEN a loading screen with a spinning baseball image displays
AND the user is navigated back to the Games page
AND the number of game tiles that are displaying is the same number of games on the selected day from the calendar
AND the selected date is displayed in the upper left corner of the screen below the navigation header

title: Select day with no games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has launched the app
AND the user is on the Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select the [calendar] button
AND the user selects a date that has no games
custom_expected:
THEN a loading screen with a spinning baseball image displays
AND the user is navigated back to the Games page
AND no game tiles are displayed
AND the text "No Games Today" displays in the center of the screen
AND the selected date is displayed in the upper left corner of the screen below the navigation header

title: Select date in previous season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has launched the app
AND the user is on the Games page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user select the [calendar] button
AND the user navigates to the previous season
AND the user selects a date with games
custom_expected:
THEN a loading screen with a spinning baseball image displays
AND the user is navigated back to the Games page
AND games for the selected date are displayed
AND the selected date is displayed in the upper left corner of the screen below the navigation header

title: Navigate back to today's games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has launched the app
AND the date on the Games page is not today
AND the calendar is displaying
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the [Today] button
custom_expected:
THEN a loading screen with a spinning baseball image displays
AND the user is navigated back to the Games page
AND the displayed date on the Games page is "Today's Games"
AND the games for today's date are displayed

title: Navigate to future months
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Games page
AND the calendar is displaying
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the [>] button
custom_expected: THEN the calendar month is updated to the next future month

title: Navigate to past months
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Games page
AND the calendar is displaying
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the [<] button
custom_expected: THEN the calendar month is updated to the next past month

title: Calendar displays month of selected date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Games page
AND the displayed date is not in the current month
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the calendar button
custom_expected:
THEN the calendar for the selected date's month is displayed
AND the selected/displayed date from the Games page has focus

title: Can access dates through past two seasons
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Games page
AND the calendar is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects any date in the previous two seasons
custom_expected: THEN the games for the selected date display

title: Cannot access games beyond past two seasons - Calendar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Games page
AND the calendar is displayed
custom_steps:
WHEN a user navigates to any date in the past beyond the previous two seasons

WHEN the user selects the [<] button
AND the user continues selecting [<] until January from two seasons ago is reached
custom_expected:
THEN the [<] button is grayed out
AND once focus leaves the grayed out button, focus cannot be reassigned while displaying January
AND the user cannot access games further back than the past two seasons

title: Cannot access games beyond past two seasons - Games page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Games page
AND displayed date is January 2nd, two seasons ago
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the [<] button
custom_expected:
THEN the displayed date is January 1
AND the [<] button is grayed out
AND focus cannot be reassigned to the [<] button once focus is removed
AND the user cannot access dates further back than the previous two seasons

title: Can access dates in next season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the current date is not before July 1st
AND the user is on the Games page
AND the calendar is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to any date in the next season
custom_expected: THEN any date in the next season can be accessed

title: Cannot access dates in next season - Feature not yet implemented
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the current date is before July 1st
AND the user is on the Games page
AND the calendar is displayed
custom_steps: WHEN a user navigates to any date in the next season
custom_expected: THEN any date in the next season cannot be accessed
